title: Favorite James Bond actor in the United States 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Actors on X-axis for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Actor Sean Connery had the maximum Share of respondents among all 5 groups, and it was for Very favorable. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Actor Sean Connery for Very unfavorable.
Among all the Actors, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 in Actor Sean Connery and lowest value 7.0 in Actor George Lazenby.
There is a gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Very favorable in Actor Sean Connery and George Lazenby.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Actors on X-axis for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Actor Sean Connery, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 among the 5 groups and in Sean Connery, Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Actors on X-axis for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Actor Sean Connery had the maximum Share of respondents among all 5 groups, and it was for Very favorable. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Actor Sean Connery for Very unfavorable.
Among all the Actors, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 in Actor Sean Connery and lowest value 7.0 in Actor George Lazenby.
There is a gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Very favorable in Actor Sean Connery and George Lazenby.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Actors on X-axis for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Actor Sean Connery, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 among the 5 groups and in Sean Connery, Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0.
Among all the Actors, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 in Actor Sean Connery and lowest value 7.0 in Actor George Lazenby.
Actor Sean Connery and George Lazenby had the biggest gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Very favorable.
Among all 5 groups, Very favorable had the gap of 54.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Actor Sean Connery and George Lazenby respectively.

Very favorable had the maximum Share of respondents out of all 5 groups in Actor Sean Connery followed by Very favorable in Sean Connery, and the minimum Share of respondents is found for Very unfavorable in Sean Connery.

Averaging all 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion, the Actor Daniel Craig is the maximum Share of respondents and Sean Connery is the minimum Share of respondents.
